Accounts
========

List, get, and create Socialtext accounts.

.. seealso::
	For detailed information about the Accounts URI, please see the `Socialtext documentation`__
	
	__ https://www.socialtext.net/st-rest-docs/data_accounts

-------

	:members: create, get, list

	:members: get
